languages.english-overview:
bbPress is forum software with a twist from the creators of WordPress. bbPress is plain and simple forum software, plain and simple. It’s easy to use, easy to administrate, fast and clean. But don’t let its simplicity deceive you; underneath the gleam, it’s got some powerful features and is highly customizable
bbPress is released under the GNU/GPL license.
languages.english-features:
Some of bbPress major features include:
Open Source, always and forever
Less (code) is more
Simplicity is a feature
Speed and security are the foundation of any good user experience
Put the user first
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-err_no_dbprefix: Could not determine the database prefix
